name: PM-KISAN Samman Nidhi
description: Direct income support scheme providing financial assistance to eligible landholding farmer families across India.
eligibility_rules: Must be a landholding farmer family
Land must be in the applicant's name
benefit: ₹6,000 per year in 3 equal instalments of ₹2,000 each
steps: Visit nearest CSC or apply online at pmkisan.gov.in

name: Pradhan Mantri Ujjwala Yojana (PMUY)
description: Scheme to provide free LPG connections to women from Below Poverty Line (BPL) households.
eligibility_rules: Household should be from BPL/eligible category
No existing LPG connection in the household
benefit: Free LPG connection, stove support, and first refill as per norms

name: Pradhan Mantri Jan Dhan Yojana (PMJDY)
description: Financial inclusion program to ensure access to financial services like banking, insurance, and pension.
eligibility_rules: Any Indian citizen can open account
documents_required: Aadhaar Card or any valid ID
benefit: Zero balance bank account, RuPay debit card, ₹2 lakh accident insurance, ₹30,000 life cover, overdraft facility up to ₹10,000
steps: Visit any bank branch or banking correspondent

name: Ayushman Bharat PM-JAY
description: World's largest health insurance scheme providing coverage for secondary and tertiary hospitalization.
eligibility_rules: Families identified based on SECC 2011 data
No family size or age limit
Pre-existing diseases covered from day one
benefit: Health coverage up to ₹5 lakh per family per year for hospitalization
steps: Visit Ayushman Mitra at empanelled hospital

name: Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana - Gramin (PMAY-G)
description: Housing scheme to provide pucca houses with basic amenities to eligible rural households.
eligibility_rules: Listed in SECC 2011 as houseless/kutcha house
Priority to SC/ST, minorities, BPL families
Not benefited from any housing scheme earlier
benefit: ₹1.20 lakh in plains and ₹1.30 lakh in hilly areas for house construction
steps: Verify inclusion in PMAY-G list at Gram Panchayat
Receive funds in instalments linked to construction progress

name: MGNREGA (Mahatma Gandhi National Rural Employment Guarantee Act)
description: Legal guarantee for 100 days of wage employment per year to rural households willing to do unskilled manual work.
eligibility_rules: Willing to do unskilled manual work
Work demanded within 15 days or unemployment allowance
benefit: 100 days guaranteed wage employment per household per year at minimum wage rates
steps: Apply for Job Card at Gram Panchayat
Get work within 15 days of demand
Receive wages within 15 days of work

name: Indira Gandhi National Old Age Pension Scheme (IGNOAPS)
description: Monthly pension for elderly citizens from BPL families under National Social Assistance Programme.
eligibility_rules: Not receiving pension from other sources
steps: Apply at Block/Tehsil office or online portal

name: Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana (PMFBY)
description: Comprehensive crop insurance scheme to protect farmers against crop loss due to natural calamities.
eligibility_rules: Both loanee and non-loanee farmers eligible
benefit: Insurance coverage for crop loss with premium of only 2% for Kharif, 1.5% for Rabi crops
steps: Enroll via bank/CSC/PMFBY portal during season
Report crop loss to insurance company

name: Sukanya Samriddhi Yojana (SSY)
description: Small savings scheme for girl child to build fund for education and marriage expenses.
eligibility_rules: Girl child below 10 years of age
Only 2 accounts per family (exceptions for twins/triplets)
benefit: High interest rate (currently ~8%), tax benefits under Section 80C, tax-free maturity
steps: Visit post office or authorized bank

name: PM SVANidhi (Street Vendor's AtmaNirbhar Nidhi)
description: Micro-credit scheme for street vendors to restart business affected by COVID-19 lockdowns.
eligibility_rules: Street vendor with vending certificate or ID
Identified in survey conducted by ULB
benefit: Working capital loan up to ₹10,000-50,000 without collateral, interest subsidy of 7%

name: Pradhan Mantri MUDRA Yojana
description: Loans for micro and small enterprises to help them grow and create employment.
eligibility_rules: No collateral required for loans up to ₹10 lakh
benefit: Loans up to ₹10 lakh - Shishu (up to ₹50,000), Kishore (₹50,000-5 lakh), Tarun (₹5-10 lakh)

name: Pradhan Mantri Suraksha Bima Yojana (PMSBY)
description: Accident insurance scheme offering coverage for death or disability due to accident.
benefit: ₹2 lakh for accidental death, ₹2 lakh for total disability, ₹1 lakh for partial disability
steps: Claim by nominee in case of accident
